moduleMeta.name: riverToGrid
moduleMeta.author: longyinping11@lzb.ac.cn
moduleMeta.description: getting river depth and river water depth at each grid of the study area from values saved in flow intervals

var.name: Drw
var.description: water depth of each flow interval

var.name: row
var.description: the row number of each grid in each flow interval

var.name: col
var.description: the colum number of each grid in each flow interval

var.name: ngrid
var.description: the number of grids in each flow interval

var.name: nflow
var.description: the number of flow intervals in each subbasin

var.name: nrows
var.description: the nrows value in the ascii file

var.name: ncols
var.description: the ncols value in the ascii file

var.name: nodata
var.description: the nodata value in the ascii file

var.name: Drw_grid2D
var.description: averaged flow interval water depth at each grid of the study area

var.name: Dr_grid2D
var.description: averaged flow interval depth at each grid of the study area
